overview: Ten-year-old Jo spends her days along the Shenandoah River with her best friend Selma, fishing, scrapping for metalâ€“surviving. But when her abusive junkie stepdad dies, Jo decides, Selma in tow, to dump the body, steal the car, and set off across the country in search of her real dad, a legendary folk singer in Los Angeles.
title: Her Name Was Jo
